key_features.Data Masking: Changes sensitive production data to realistic test data
key_features.Expression: Calculates values in a single row
key_features.Joiner: Joins source data from two related heterogeneous sources
key_features.Filter: Filters out rows in a mapping
key_features.Lookup: Looks up data in a flat file, relational table, view or synonym
key_features.Rank: Selects top or bottom rank of data
key_features.Router: Tests data for one or more conditions and routes rows of data
key_features.Union: Merges data from multiple pipelines or pipeline branches
key_features.XML: Adds an XML Source Qualifier transformation to a mapping
key_features.Normalizer: Receives a row that contains multiple-occurring columns and returns a row for each instance of the multiple-occurring data
key_features.H2R and R2H Transformation: Converts hierarchical data models to relational database and vice versa

priceAndPlans.model: Consumption-based pricing with Informatica Processing Unit (IPU)
priceAndPlans.details: With IPU pricing, you buy capacity on an IPU and/or Flex IPU consumption model to use across a range of cloud services. You’re free to innovate and rapidly onboard new capabilities without worrying about connectivity or cost. IPU pricing excludes master data management (MDM) capabilities; volume-tier progressive pricing is available for MDM.

usecases: Designed for modern cloud data warehouses
Matillion.solutions: Cloud-native data transformation tool explicitly designed for modern cloud data warehouses like Snowflake, Google BigQuery, and Amazon Redshift. Offers push-down processing approach for efficient processing and reduced data movement.
